 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלָה‎</span>] **verb** ==make light of, toss aside== (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***salû, throw off***</u></abbr>, ***shake off*** (yoke) [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>500</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be forgetful, neglectful*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1417</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְלָא‎</span> ***despise***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reject***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלִיתָ‎</span> [[Ps.119.118|Ps 119:118]] ***thou dost make light of*** all those that err from thy statutes. — compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַלּוֺן‎</span> below **Pi\`el** ==intensive== ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִלָּה‎</span> [[Lam.1.15|Lam 1:15]] Adonay ***hath flouted at*** my mighty ones. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלָה‎</span>] **verb** ==weigh, balance== (\|\| form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלָא‎</span> q.v); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹאתְֿסֻלֶּה בְּכֶתֶם‎</span> [[Job.28.16|Job 28:16]] ***it cannot be weighed against*** (estimated in) ***gold*** of Ophir, compare v[[Job.28.19|Job 28:19]]. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֶ֫לָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סלל‎</span> below
